languages.text: Картину писали будто бы разные люди — робкие, неуверенные линии сменяются яростными мазками, образуя таинственные формы.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Картина нарисованная Кассией, она не плохо рисует

languages.text: It is as if the painting was rendered by several different hands — the timid, uncertain lines are interlaced with rough and furious strokes, coming together in arcane shapes.
languages.original_text: Картину писали будто бы разные люди — робкие, неуверенные линии сменяются яростными мазками, образуя таинственные формы.

traits.locale_text: It is like the painting was made by different people — the timid, uncertain lines are followed by rough and furious strokes, forming arcane shapes.
It is like the painting was made by different people — the timid, uncertain lines are followed by rough and furious strokes, forming arcane shapes.
It is as if the painting was drawn by different hands — the timid, uncertain lines are interlaced with rough and furious strokes, coming together in arcane shapes.
It is as if the painting was drawn by different hands — the timid, uncertain lines are interlaced with rough and furious strokes, coming together in arcane shapes.
It is as if the painting was rendered by several different hands — the timid, uncertain lines are interlaced with rough and furious strokes, coming together in arcane shapes.
It is as if the painting was rendered by several different hands — the timid, uncertain lines are interlaced with rough and furious strokes, coming together in arcane shapes.

languages.text: Es ist, als sei das Gemälde von mehreren verschiedenen Händen gemalt worden. Die schüchternen, unsicheren Linien sind vermischt mit rauen, wilden Strichen. Gemeinsam ergeben sie arkane Formen.
languages.original_text: It is as if the painting was rendered by several different hands — the timid, uncertain lines are interlaced with rough and furious strokes, coming together in arcane shapes.

traits.locale_text: Es ist, als sei das Gemälde von unterschiedlichen Händen angefertigt worden. Die schüchtern, unsicheren Linien sind vermischt mit rauen, wilden Strichen. Gemeinsam ergeben sie arkane Formen.

languages.text: Le dessin semble être l'œuvre de différentes mains : des traits timides et hésitants se mêlent à des lignes furieuses et grossières, dessinant ensemble des motifs magiques.
languages.original_text: It is as if the painting was rendered by several different hands — the timid, uncertain lines are interlaced with rough and furious strokes, coming together in arcane shapes.

traits.locale_text: Le dessin semble être l'œuvre de différentes mains : des traits timides et hésitants se mêlent à des lignes furieuses et grossières, dessinant ensemble des motifs magiques.

languages.text: 这幅画仿佛是由好几个不同的人画出来的。怯懦不安的线条与粗犷狂暴的笔触交错在一起，汇聚成奇妙的形状。
languages.original_text: It is as if the painting was rendered by several different hands — the timid, uncertain lines are interlaced with rough and furious strokes, coming together in arcane shapes.

traits.locale_text: 这幅画仿佛是许多不同的人画出来的。怯懦不安的线条与粗犷狂暴的笔触交错在一起，汇聚成奇妙的形状。

languages.text: まるで作者が何人もいるかのような絵だ。気弱で心許ない線が、荒々しく力強い筆捌きと絡み合い、難解な形を作り上げている。
languages.original_text: It is as if the painting was rendered by several different hands — the timid, uncertain lines are interlaced with rough and furious strokes, coming together in arcane shapes.

traits.locale_text: まるで描き手が何人もいるかのような絵だ。気の弱そうな心許ない線が、荒々しく力強い筆捌きと絡み合い、難解な形を作り上げている。
まるで作者が何人もいるかのような絵だ。気弱で心許ない線が、荒々しく力強い筆捌きと絡み合い、難解な形を作り上げている。

languages.text: Es como si el cuadro hubiera sido obra de varias personas. Las pinceladas tímidas e inciertas se entrelazan con brochazos bruscos y furiosos, creando formas arcanas.
languages.original_text: It is as if the painting was rendered by several different hands — the timid, uncertain lines are interlaced with rough and furious strokes, coming together in arcane shapes.

traits.locale_text: Es como si el cuadro hubiera sido creado por varias personas. Las pinceladas tímidas e inciertas se entrelazan con brochazos bruscos y furiosos, creando formas arcanas.

languages.text: Resim, sanki birkaç farklı el tarafından yapılmış gibi. Ürkek ve kararsız çizgiler, sert ve öfkeli vuruşlarla birbirine girerek arkana şekillerde bir araya gelmiş.
languages.original_text: It is as if the painting was rendered by several different hands — the timid, uncertain lines are interlaced with rough and furious strokes, coming together in arcane shapes.

traits.locale_text: Resim, sanki birkaç farklı el tarafından yapılmış gibi. Ürkek ve kararsız çizgiler, sert ve öfkeli vuruşlarla birbirine girerek arkana şekillerde bir araya gelmiş.
